segments.text: It's amazing to me how international business has become . Take my store for example . On any given day , you will find imported items from more than 20 different countries on our shelves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many different varieties of products do you import from China ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: China provides the bulk of our product inventory , for sure . We import more than 40 different items from China . Most of the imports that come out of China are low-grade plastics or toys . Japan produces many electronic exports , Germany produces excellent mechanical exports .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you import any food items ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Generally speaking , food items are difficult to import . Food with the short shelf life is liable to spoil in the time it takes to ship from one place to another . The only food items we import are specialty canned or preserved foods . The shelf life is longer for these products .
segments.speaker: S1
